title: Core Technology Intern
description: Implemented machine learning models, including neural networks, evolutionary algorithms, and ensemble methods, to parameterize a model that can help predict the occurence of corrosion.

title: Senior Caretaker
description: I took care of the elderly during the COVID pandemic. Tasks included feeding, aiding walking, massaging, and returning them home. I also designed a computer program that automated document preparation (see my projects for details).

title: Lab Technician
description: I set up and cleaned up experiments performed by freshme, sophomore, and junior Chemistry students.

title: Web Development Intern
description: I helped update the backend website for Switch Malaysia by implementing Content Management System Software (CMS) via Aimeos so that non-developers can update the main website. I also pioneered the conversion from behavior-driven development (BDD) to test-driven development (TDD) via PhP PEST

title: Peer Tutor
description: I was the only official peer tutor for the entire general chemistry and organic chemistry courses. I also helped students in their introductory coding courses.
